# Empire of the Petal Throne

Player sheet for Empire of the Petal Throne by M.A.R. Barker, published by TSR in 1975.
This sheet was created at the request of one of M.A.R. Barker's original players.


## Player Sheet

* The player sheet is based on an early TSR character sheet for Empire of the Petal Throne.


## Current Version: 1.0
